suite.name: update_manager
suite.description: Tests that verify different actions with the Update Manager application in Ubuntu

case.name: Unselect All
case.description: It selects no updates and checks if the size of the download equals 0B

case.name: Update None
case.description: It checks twice for updates but it does not update anything. #updates should be equal.

case.name: Update First
case.description: It install the first available update. It checks that it is not on the list after the update.
